mapper.select: select k.*, s.createtime "secgoods.createtime", s.endtime "secgoods.endtime", s.`name` "secgoods.name", s.number "secgoods.number", s.secgoodid "secgoods.secgoodid", s.starttime "secgoods.starttime" from success_killed k LEFT OUTER JOIN secgoods s on k.secgoodid=s.secgoodid where s.secgoodid =#{secGoodsid} and k.userphone=#{userphone}
